divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS LOOKING DIRECTLY SOUTH OVER THE GULF OF MEXICO WHEN I BEGAN TO LOOK TO MYRIGHT WESTAND BECAME AWARE OF A VERY BRIGHT OBJECT ABOVE THE HORIZON.THE OBJECTWAS MUCH MORE RADIANT THAN ANY STARS AND LARGER AS WELL. AT THIS POINT ANOTHEROBJECT WITH VARIOUS STROBES ON IT WAS CLOSING IN ON THIS OBJECT WHICH WAS ABOVE.I TOOK THIS SECOND OBJECT TO BE A MILITARY HELIOCOPTER DUE TO ITS SLOW SPEED. ASTHE COPTER FLEW DIRECTLY UNDER IT THE BRIGHT OBJECT SIMPLY VANISHED AS IFTURNING OFF A LIGHT.THE SECOND OBJECT COME TO A STOP AND BEGAN A BACK AND FORTHFLYING PATTERN AS IF LOOKING FOR SOMETHING. THE BRIGHT OBJECT DID NOT REAPPEARHOWEVER THE OTHER CRAFT, HELICOPTER , WHAT HAVE YOU , REMAINED IN THE SAME AREAFOR APPROXIMENTLY THREE TO FOUR MINUTES LONGER AND CONTINUED TOWARDS LAND.
